dcterms:creator: L. Bozarth
C. Budak
dcterms:description: A dataset containing 1.85 million tweets from social movements in 2018-2019, focusing on three issue areas: guns, immigration, and LGBTQ rights. The dataset includes tweets collected using keyword expansion techniques and is annotated for relevance, stance, and framing strategies.
dcterms:title: Dataset of 1.85M tweets from movements in 2018-2019

dcterms:creator: L. Bozarth
C. Budak
dcterms:description: The Crowd Counting Consortium (CCC) data provides information on collective action events, including the number of participants in protests and demonstrations across various issue areas.
dcterms:title: Crowd Counting Consortium (CCC) data
